betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe controller is the main block for all of the pack's custom multiblocks. 

CAREFUL: you should not place multiblocks on chunk boundaries!

§fMy experiments paid off! The rules of technology apply to science. These higher dimensional 'mythic fields' that guide the flow of magic can be harnessed by anything that follows their rules. And this includes machines that will allow me to bring magic to the fires of industrialization!
And so much more...
